title: NO more paper
descriptors: It's a drivers work diary that's simple to use, helps remove the hassle and keeps you up to date.

title: Informed with a glance
descriptors: Unique to logmate, our Traffic light colour scheme means, at a glance, you know your current status.

title: Notified when needed
descriptors: Intelligent Alarms give you a heads up when you need to Take a Break, End a Break, even when you need to End Work for the day.

title: Less admin
descriptors: Automatic delivery of logbook records to nominated Transport Service license holders.

title: Always available
descriptors: All logbook data is stored safely in the cloud so you can access it when-ever and from where-ever.
